short_summary: Supplying AKTApure 150M systems and AxiChrom columns
description: The National Research Council (NRC) Human Health Therapeutics (HHT) has a requirement for the supply of three (3) AKTApure 150M system and four (4) new Chromatography columns: two (2) with 50mm and two (2) with 100mm internal dimeter.
full_summary:
## Advance Contract Award Notice
### Solicitation Details
#### Issuer
National Research Council Canada (NRC)
#### Address
6100 Royalmount Ave, Montreal, QC, H4P 2R2, Canada
#### Contact
Roberta Ranaldi, (613) 299-8229, [roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

### Contract Details
#### Tender Title
Procurement of AKTApure 150M System and AxiChrom Columns (50-100 mm ID)
#### Contract Number
23-58188
#### Procurement Method
Advance Contract Award Notice
#### Service or Goods Required
Supply of three AKTApure 150M systems and four new Chromatography columns (two 50 mm and two 100 mm internal diameter)

### Tender Status
This tender has expired and is no longer open for bidding.

### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to various trade agreements including:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Regions of Delivery
Canada

### End User Entity
None

### Notice URL
None

### Attachments
* English package: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28558/23-58188_acan_aktapure-150m-system-and-axichrom-columns-50-100-mm-id_e.pdf>
* French package: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28558/23-58188_acan_aktapure-150m-system-and-axichrom-columns-50-100-mm-id_f.pdf>  # Advance Contract Award Notice
